TopicTitle: Top, Top, Top of the World

Articles.Content:
At this [time!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) next year

I may have enough to buy the [whole!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) da..

Whoops wrong one. This challenge is to land/drive/fly to any highest peak in [the solar system!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/). So Tylo, Dres, Moho, etceteria. Simple at first, but hard in reality. You don't only have to get to the peak, you have to fly to the planet and have a worthy craft to land precisely. Right, let's get on the the [story!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) from the kerbal's POV.

Story

"Have you ever seen a sunrise from the highest point," said Bill. "Highest point? Already been there," exclaimed Jeb. "No, I mean anywhere else out there, like Tylo, or the Mun." "Well no, no I haven't...." "Well, the government was generous to give us money for such a mission, and you can fly [the craft!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) if you wish." "Can't hear you Bill, I'm getting interference from [the engines!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) on the rocket." "Oh boy, here we go.........."

Main Mission

Land on the highest point anywhere in the system with the lowest funds possible, and [return!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/).

DA RULES

Visual and Info Mods only\*

No Cheats, Debug [Menu!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/), or Edited Configs

No Commando Seats

No more than 2 launches (Drive and Lander can be assembled in orbit)

Must be a new rocket (built in VAB, and used in mission)

YOU MUST RETURN, MAY IT BE FROM GILLY TO EVE, ALL MISSIONS MUST BE SAFE ON KERBIN AT END

Scoreboard

Kerbin Galore (Kerbin, Minmus, or Mun)

1

2

3

4

5

Hot as Hell (Eve or Moho)

1

2

3

4

5

Rather be Red than Dead (Duna and Ike)

1

2

3

4

5

Lonely Space Potato (Dres)

1

2

3

4

5

Jolly Green Giant (Jool and it's Moons)

1

2

3

4

5

Big Ball of Ice (Eeloo)

1

2

3

4

5

\*If your payload to [complete!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) the mission is THAT heavy, use KW Rocketry or something to launch it to ORBIT ONLY

Side [challenges!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)

No bodies under 300km

Lowest mass

Land exactly on [target!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/) with no driving/flying

If I figure it out eventually, I'll make a badge for the people who take this on.

Happy fail...I mean flying!

AAAarrrgh, the NaN virus has invaded the forum software!! We have not appeased the kraken.

I shall attempt to complete the target in your challenges.

Went ahead and fixed it for ya. Just open the spoiler, copy and paste whats in there over your OP. Good luck!

I checked my extensions folders to see if I had any malware extensions installed somehow...

Good thing that it's on in the OP.
I left some snacks out for the Kraken last night, just in case.

so you need to play with the ksp version 0.17

because back then, eve had 11km high mountains, and they beat everything else in the kerbol-system. and since you didn't specify the ksp-version, only that it needs to be stock, that would be perfectly valid. and players who went to eve routinely landed there, because it was the best spot to actually make it back to orbit.

> 
> so you need to play with the ksp version 0.17
> because back then, eve had 11km high mountains, and they beat everything else in the kerbol-system. and since you didn't specify the ksp-version, only that it needs to be stock, that would be perfectly valid. and players who went to eve routinely landed there, because it was the best spot to actually make it back to orbit.

11km isn't all that much considering that Bop has a 21 755 meters tall peak. And getting there isn't necessarily that much more costly than getting to Eve if you know your gravity assists.
